createAccount(address,address,uint256).details: Reverts with `InvalidChainId` if the chain ID is not recognized.

params.implementation: The address of the TBA implementation contract.
params.tokenContract: The address of the token contract associated with the TBA.
params.tokenId: The ID of the token associated with the TBA.

returns._0: The address of the created TBA account.

getAccount(address,address,uint256).details: Reverts with `InvalidChainId` if the chain ID is not recognized.

params.implementation: The address of the TBA implementation contract.
params.tokenContract: The address of the token contract associated with the TBA.
params.tokenId: The ID of the token associated with the TBA.

returns._0: The address of the TBA account.

createAccount(address,address,uint256).notice: Creates a TBA account based on the current chain ID.

getAccount(address,address,uint256).notice: Retrieves a TBA account based on the current chain ID.
